alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McLean; Mercer; Mountrail; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 9:42PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL WARD, NORTHEASTERN DUNN, NORTHWESTERN MCLEAN, SOUTHEASTERN MOUNTRAIL AND NORTHERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CDT/930 PM MDT/... At 942 PM CDT/842 PM MDT/, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Parshall to 8 miles northeast of Little Missouri State Park. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Parshall around 945 PM CDT. Plaza around 950 PM CDT. Mckenzie Bay Recreation Area around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Makoti, Ryder, Indian Hills Recreation Area, Rice Lake and Douglas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
